theRetrospect:AdaptiveShield.NAME: Adaptive Shield
theRetrospect:AdaptiveShield.FLAVOR: The impossible shield: lighter than feather, yet stronger than steel.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, increase your max HP by 1.

theRetrospect:AntiqueStopwatch.NAME: Antique Stopwatch
theRetrospect:AntiqueStopwatch.FLAVOR: Antique in your eyes, futuristic in others'.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, play 1 #yDivert.

theRetrospect:PerpetualHourglass.NAME: Perpetual Hourglass
theRetrospect:PerpetualHourglass.FLAVOR: An hourglass with a top that never depletes and a bottom that never fill up. How odd.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a timeline #ycollapses, gain [E] next turn.
